author: jerenkrantz
msg: Support OpenSSL 0.9.8.
* buckets/ssl_buckets.c
(init_ssl_libraries): Call SSL_load_error_strings().
Submitted by: Paul Querna

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * context.c
(clean_resp): Add a comment to clarify what we're doing.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * buckets/dechunk_buckets.c:
(serf_bucket_type_dechunk): Use wrapper functions for read_iovec and
read_for_sendfile.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Handle intentional premature request death a bit more gracefully.
This fixes some double free()s that can occur with ra_serf when a request
intentionally errors out (i.e. a Subversion error is raised).
* context.c
(clean_resp): Clear out req's response pool pointer when that pool goes away.
(write_to_connection): Install cleanup for request's response pool.
(cancel_request): Take an extra argument to determine whether we've been
asked to cancel or whether we're doing it off our own initative.
(serf_connection_reset): Tell our pending requests that we're resetting.
(serf_request_cancel): If we're called, don't tell the request anything.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * buckets/ssl_buckets.c
(ssl_init_context): Ensure that stream_next is NULL.
